name: Juvenile Hook Horror

trait.name: Echolocation
text: The hook horror can't use its blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
text: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

action.name: Hook
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 34
